name: Aces Up Aviation
about: Aces Up Aviation, located at Meadow Lake Airport (KFLY) in Colorado Springs, is a specialized flight school renowned for its aerobatic training programs. Owned and operated by Gar, a former Air Force fighter pilot with thousands of hours of aerobatic and military flying experience, the school offers a range of courses including aerobatics discovery flights, advanced aerobatics training, and a fighter pilot training pre-qualifications course. Aces Up Aviation utilizes a Moravan ZLIN242L, a 200 horsepower low-wing aircraft designed for excellent aerobatic capabilities. The school is dedicated to providing high-quality instruction, ensuring pilots gain the skills and confidence needed for advanced types of military and civilian flying. With a focus on safety and proficiency, Aces Up Aviation is the ideal choice for pilots seeking specialized aerobatic training.
